tag_list: internet, technology, start-up, ecommerce, mcommerce, ecrm, telephony, publishing, wireless, finance, business, equity, pe, seed-capital, angel-investor
overview:
Mr. Sullivan is a high technology industry entrepreneur and technologist who has founded or co-founded over two dozen companies. He’s a seasoned executive and financial adviser to entrepreneurs and early stage enterprises with extensive experience in start up and entrepreneurial operations as well as operational experience in a diverse range of businesses.

Most recently he has been involved in transitioning new technology into high growth companies. He has lead investment capital strategy and arranged both debt and equity financing for several businesses. This breath of knowledge and experience allows him to contribute to early stage companies through an intimate understanding of overall business needs.
